conversation.content: The images show the following: a two-story house with a white exterior and tile roof; a modern house with large windows, stone accents, and a sleek design; a stone cottage-style house with a steep roof and garden in front; a cozy living room with built-in shelves, a large window, and classic decor; an open-concept living and kitchen area with modern furnishings and a minimalist design; and a hallway with a staircase featuring colorful tiles, arched doorways, and traditional decor.
Based on the description and images, match the images together and explain why they are connected, justifying your matches by explaining the architectural details.
